{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Buffalo LinkStation Pro (LS-250GL) v1.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = Buffalo LinkStation Pro |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.buffalotech.com/products/network-storage/linkstation/linkstation-pro |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Buffalo |model = LinkStation Pro |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (LS-GL) |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = LS-250GL |page_start_date = September 20, 2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Buffalo_LinkStation_Pro_(LS-250GL)_v1 |series = LinkStation |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F5182; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = Feroceon core |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 400 / 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SST;SST39VF020; |flash1size = 256 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Elpida;E5116AF-5C-E; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1111; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:16:01
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;Marvell 1.12.1 TINY; |stockos = Linux;2.6.16.16;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.3 |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, unpopulated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, fan |addchip = I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, 16-bit D-Type Latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC16373A;;2;,,, 30V, 7A Power Switching DC/DC Converter;Rohm Semiconductor;SP8K3;;1;,,, 4A Low Dropout Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G973;;2;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;TI;SN54LVC08A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, FreeLink, Foonas
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Japan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}}
*Available with one of the following Disk sizes: :160GB, 250GB 320GB, 400GB, 500GB, 750GB, 1TB
==Links of Interest== *[https://web.archive.org/web/20150929210605/http://buffalo.nas-central.org/wiki/Category:LSPro ''Buffalo LinkStation Pro (LS-GL) v1/v2'' on '''NAS Central''' Wiki] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/28111-buffalolinkstationproreview ''Buffalo LinkStation Pro (LS-250GL)'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://miniconf.debian.or.jp/assets/files/Debian%20Installer%20for%20Buffalo%20Linkstation%20NAS.pdf Debian Installer for Buffalo Linkstation]
